Plot: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Viet Nam War.
Title: Rescue Dawn
Actors: Zach Grenier, Marshall Bell, Christian Bale, Toby Huss
tomatoConsensus: Director Werner Herzog has once again made a compelling tale of man versus nature, and Christian Bale completely immerses himself in the role of fighter pilot (and prisoner of war) Dieter Dengler.
